Профилактическое мышление.Что хочет сопе: Preventive Thinking: What does the opponent want?
Игра в шахматах всегда начинается с одно: The game of chess always starts from the same position. In total, the game features 6 chess pieces, each of which has a name, a graphic symbol, and its "value", determined by the number of pawns equal to its strength. Please note that although the king is equal to 3 pawns in strength, in fact he is invaluable, because he is the most important figure in the game.
Как было упомянуто в предыдущем уроке, к: As mentioned in the previous lesson, the king is the main (though not the strongest) figure in the game. The king, who has no obstacles for his moves, can move one field in any direction
The queen is the strongest piece in chess. The queen can move horizontally, vertically, and diagonally any number of squares.
Ладья - младшая сестра ферзя. Так же, ка: The rook is the younger sister of the queen. Just like the queen, the rook moves to any number of fields horizontally and vertically, but it cannot walk diagonally.
Слон - младший брат ферзя. Как и ферзь,: The bishop is the younger brother of the queen. Like the queen, the bishop moves to any number of fields, but only diagonally. All chess pieces can move across fields of different colors, but this does not apply to the bishop. The bishop will walk across fields of the same color until the end of the game. That is why bishops are called white-field and black-field.
Конь - самая необычная из фигур. Всем из: The knight is the most unusual of the pieces. Everyone knows that the knight moves in an "L" shape. Another important feature of this piece is that it can jump over other pieces.
Пешка - единственная фигура, которой не: The pawn is the only piece that is not allowed to move backwards. Pawns move vertically, only forward and only one square. The exception is if the pawn is in the initial position, then it can, at the choice of the chess player, move to one or two squares.
Лабиринт Съешьте ладьей коня g3. 5 ходов: Maze: Eat the knight's rook g3. 5 moves. Rules: 1. Walk with only one figure 2. You can't get up to fight 3. You can eat enemy pieces. 4. The opponent does not move.
Лабиринт Съешьте ладьей пешку g5. 4 хода: Maze: Eat the g5 pawn with a rook. 4 moves.
Лабиринт Съешьте ладьей пешку а2. 5 ходо: Maze: Eat the a2 pawn with a rook. 5 moves.
Maze: Eat the knight's rook b6. 4 moves.
Лабиринт Съешьте ладьей коня е3. 12 ходо: Maze: Eat the knight's rook e3. 12 moves.
Лабиринт Съешьте ладьей слона b1. 10 ход: Maze: Eat bishop b1 with a rook. 10 moves.

Какую рокировку из двух выбрал Пол Морфи: Which castling of the two did Paul Morphy choose in 1858?
